[vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1579706454951{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1652774462619{background-image: url(https://esplanade.hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/topline1.jpg?id=9005) !important;}”]
A HOTEL OF DISTINCTION, GLAMOUR, STYLE AND TRADITION

Welcome to the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel

Opened in 1925 as a refuge for passengers from the Orient Express, the über-stylish Esplanade Zagreb Hotel is an architectural gem. Located within easy reach of key attractions, the city’s most iconic hotel combines art deco glamour with every contemporary convenience. Long-established as a haven for A-List movie stars, politicians, singers and artists, the hotel’s fairytale exterior and gracious guest accommodation make it easily the most prestigious hotel in Zagreb.

[vc_empty_space height=”28px”] BOOK [vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1667381418330{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”8742″][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1652340267433{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column]

Beautifully designed rooms blended with the delicate combination of Art Deco heritage and contemporary touches. Discover long history of first-class service, spectacular facilities and simply amazing food. Experience the true essence of luxury at the iconic Esplanade Zagreb Hotel

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”6984″ css=”.vc_custom_1652772118118{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1705062655439{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]
A SUMPTUOUS ADVENT, A FAIRY-TALE CHRISTMAS AND A GALA 2024 NEW YEAR'S EVE

Magical Festive Season at the Esplanade

This Advent the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel is inviting you to experience magical culinary tales, as the smell of cinnamon, sparkling bubbles of pure pleasure, and the sweetest cookies in town entice you into mingling and enjoying yourself.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] DISCOVER [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1705062693696{margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]
A LONG HISTORY OF FIRST-CLASS SERVICE, SPECTACULAR FACILITIES AND SIMPLY AMAZING FOOD.

Experience the true essence of luxury

Esplanade Zagreb Hotel offers supreme luxury for the spirit and all the senses in the heart of this historic city, close to all its major sights and delights. This iconic Zagreb landmark, with its long and distinguished history of world-class hospitality, re-opened in 2004 after a complete renovation, designed to flawlessly merge the best of 21st century comforts with the alluring appeal of Art Noveau architecture.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] BOOK [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”8855″ css=”.vc_custom_1650612318454{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1650612596483{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]
SUPREME ELEGANCE. PRIVATE SANCTUARIES.

Exquisite Rooms & Suites

Each of our thoughtfully-designed and spacious rooms offers traditional art deco glamour in the heart of Croatia’s vibrant capital. From imaginative cuisine to the sumptuous marble bathrooms on offer in each of our 208 rooms and suites, each guest is treated as a VIP by our attentive and professional staff. Stunning view of the city, and complimentary superfast Internet, a whole range of room amenities, fully non-smoking rooms and sophisticated interior offer guests a true feeling of home.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] MORE

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”8874″ css=”.vc_custom_1650617719138{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1650619747245{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]
GRAND STYLE OR BUZZY, AL FRESCO DINING EXPERIENCE.

The Finest Zagreb Restaurants

From High Society-inspired dining to modern Mediterranean chic and serving simply the best Strukli in town, the award-winning collection of restaurants at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel lead the pack. Presided over by our talented Chef Ana Grgić Tomić, whose loyal clientele includes top food critics, we showcase Europe’s top fine and bistro dining traditions in the city’s most elegant hotel.

[vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”70px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650619896315{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;border-top-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511517740774{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-xs-12″]
Grand style or buzzy, al fresco dining experience.

The Finest Zagreb Restaurants

From High Society-inspired dining to modern Mediterranean chic and serving simply the best Strukli in town, the award-winning collection of restaurants at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel lead the pack. Presided over by our talented Chef Ana Grgic, whose loyal clientele includes top food critics, we showcase Europe’s top fine and bistro dining traditions in the city’s most elegant hotel.

[vc_empty_space height=”28px”] Our menu
[/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511517730283{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”6546″ css=”.vc_custom_1650620299336{margin-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1652773209058{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”70px”]
SUPERB FACILITIES. IMPECCABLE SERVICE. PROFESSIONALISM AND PERSONAL TOUCH.

Meetings & Events

Allow our experienced team to create a truly memorable business function at the heart of one of Europe’s most intriguing cities. Flexible space, an abundance of natural daylight and one of the most glamorous ballrooms in the world set the scene for a spectacular events service twinning traditional grandeur with state-of-the-art amenities.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] MORE [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1650620358431{margin-right: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1652782931953{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text el_class=”citat”] Esplanade’s timeless elegance, sophistication and charm, which back in 1925 attracted passengers of
the famous Orient Express, today is considered an elite venue and cultural historic icon of Zagreb [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”8892″ css=”.vc_custom_1651477342799{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1630413081345{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1651477727764{margin-top: 100px !important;}”]
RECOVER. UNWIND. SPOIL YOURSELF WITH A SHORT BREAK OF PURE BLISS.

Health & Relaxation

Enjoy all the wellbeing treatments and facilities available at our exclusive Health Club. Pamper yourself with a skin or body treatment from a comprehensive range of therapies designed to de-stress, replenish and revitalise.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” parallax_background_image=”8905″ css=”.vc_custom_1651478195999{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column]
